attributes.action: Issue a medal for Service personnel in receipt of either a War Pension or, the new AFCS .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People who have been injured as a result of their Service in the Armed Forces should have some tangible recognition, a thank if you like, from the nation. 

At present most severely disabled ex-service personnel survive on a paltry war pension, most have never received 
an official thank you for their sacrfice and, a lot now live on "CHARITY" SSAFA BLESMA etc. At least a medal would give many disabled personnel "At least it was appreciated" feeling.  The joke is it wouldn't be expensive, unlike the cost to those disabled men and women.
